controller

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController

  • public class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseController class, its job is to deliver data. Window controllers use database controller to get data from database or change data in the database
    Author:
    szt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseController()
      constructor, initialize the connection to the database

      • createRecipe

        public boolean createRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        create recipe method, create recipe and its ingredients in database
        Parameters:
        recipe - recipe's entity
        Returns:
        true or false of creating result

      • updateRecipe

        public boolean updateRecipe(Recipe recipe,
                            java.lang.String recipeNameToBeUpdate,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> neededToDelIngredientInDetailWindow,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> neededToAddIngredientInDetailWindow)
        update recipe method, to update recipe in the database according to received parameters
        Parameters:
        recipe - recipe data used to update recipe
        recipeNameToBeUpdate - indicate which recipe is going to be updated
        neededToDelIngredientInDetailWindow - deleted ingredients in table
        neededToAddIngredientInDetailWindow - added ingredients in table
        Returns:
        true or false of updating result

      • deleteRecipe

        public boolean deleteRecipe(java.lang.String recipeName)
        delete recipe method according to recipeName parameter
        Parameters:
        recipeName - indicates which recipe is needed to be deleted
        Returns:
        true or false of the deleting result

      • searchRecipe

        public Recipe searchRecipe(java.lang.String recipeName)
        search recipe method according to given parameter recipeName
        Parameters:
        recipeName - the string value of recipe name used to search recipe in database
        Returns:
        searched recipe from database

      • searchRecipeList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> searchRecipeList(java.lang.String searchedCategory)
        search recipe category method, used to get a list of recipes belong to given category searchedCategory
        Parameters:
        searchedCategory - used to search recipes belong to this category
        Returns:
        return the ArrayList result of recipes of given category
